title: France panorama. [No. 70/12]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. European handball championships. 2. President Pompidou visits the USA and meets President Nixon. 3. The world’s biggest microscope. 4. Les Charlots singing group. 5. Memories of Claude Monet - an exhibition in Paris. 6. Saint-Germain-des-Pres 25 years after the birth of Existentialism. 7. Singers Juliette Greco, Annabel and other artists of the period.
